constantValues: Vehicle or device that a customer wants to use as part of payment buying another one (new or used).

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: appraisalSource

constantValues: Name of the entity that provided the appraisal valuation.

members.name: appraisedValue

constantValues: Estimated value as provided by the appraiser.

members.name: appraisedValueBase

constantValues: Value of the appraised value in base currency.

constantValues: The initial identification of the customer as a potential buyer.
